          [17 Aug 1993 00:00:00] When Michael Wood was 20 years old, he got into a heated argument with his mother, Millie, about his future. Millie, worried about his lack of direction, pleaded with him to consider a more stable career path. Michael, in a fit of rage, stormed out of the house and headed straight to The White Hart, where he drowned his sorrows in cheap beer and lamented to his friends about his suffocating life. He vowed to never let anyone tell him what to do, even if it meant living a life of chaos.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Michael Wood is 41 years old.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood' are best friends. Michael Wood has a favorite pub which is The White Hart. They are also aware of the following:Hosts regular cocktail masterclasses and tasting events.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Have a good time. To have a good time, Michael Wood would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Michael Wood would prefer everyone went to The White Hart.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [goal] Michael Wood goals is to have a good time. Michael Wood would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Michael Wood would prefer everyone went to The White Hart.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Michael Wood is a member of the upper class.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Here is the conversation from the beginning:
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The year is 2015. This week is the European football cup.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] European football cup is on.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] European football cup is on.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Gibraltar and Ireland. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Michael Wood would likely want to go to The White Hart to watch the game and enjoy some good food with his friends.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Vibrant murals and graffiti adorn the brick walls of Shoreditch. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood wander through the streets, their eyes wide with wonder as they discover hidden gems of urban art. The smell of street food wafts from nearby vendors, tempting them to take a break. Michael Wood just arrived.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          Current time: 2015-05-14 18:00:00.


          Question: What kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.

          Question: What kind of situation is Michael Wood in right now?
          Answer: Michael Wood is currently preparing to go to The White Hart pub with his friends to watch a football game.
          Question: What would a person like Michael Wood do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Michael Wood would likely be leading the way to the pub, eager to enjoy the game and some good food with his friends.

2015-05-14 18:00:00 Thomas Wilson -- The White Hart
    Event statement
  • The White Hart
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Thomas Wilson's attempted action: The White Hart

        Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Thomas Wilson are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Thomas Wilson. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Thomas Wilson as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Thomas Wilson would respond, and taking into account all information about Thomas Wilson that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

        • Recent observations of Thomas Wilson:
          [07 Oct 1998 00:00:00]
          [07 Oct 2002 00:00:00] When Thomas Wilson was 16, he found himself at a party thrown by a popular girl in his class. He observed the other guests, mimicking their laughter and slang, desperately wanting to fit in. He even pretended to like a band he secretly found annoying, just to earn a smile from the girl he had a crush on. By the end of the night, he felt utterly exhausted, realizing that the mask he wore felt heavier than ever.

2015-05-15 10:00:00 Scene 2 --- Participants: ['Thomas Wilson', 'Millie Wood', 'Mia Williams', 'Phoebe Young', 'Michael Wood']
    Event statement
  • Thomas Wilson -- premise: A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Thomas Wilson just arrived.
    Thomas Wilson -- premise: Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.

Michael Wood just arrived.
    Michael Wood -- premise: Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.

2015-05-15 10:00:00 Mia Williams -- Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
    Event statement
  • Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.

      Conversation history: Here is the conversation from the beginning:
      Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
      Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
      Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.


      Mia Williams's attempted action: Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
    Active player
  • Mia Williams
      Name
    • Mia Williams
      Action attempt
    • Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
      Context for action selection and components

      • Overarching goal

      • Overarching goal
          Key

        • Overarching goal
          Value
        • Have a good time. To have a good time, Mia Williams would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Mia Williams would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.
        TimeDisplay

      • Current time
          Key

        • Current time
          Value
        • 15 May 2015 [10:00 - 10:05]
        Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Mia Williams are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Mia Williams. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Mia Williams as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Mia Williams would respond, and taking into account all information about Mia Williams that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
        SelfPerception
      • Given the above, what kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Key

        • Question: What kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Answer
          State
        • Mia Williams is a sociable and friendly young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Mia Williams:
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood' are best friends. Mia Williams has a favorite pub which is The Clapton Hart. They are also aware of the following:A modern and stylish pub with a vibrant atmosphere.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [goal] Mia Williams goals is to have a good time. Mia Williams would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Mia Williams would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Mia Williams is a member of the working class.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Here is the conversation from the beginning:
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The year is 2015. This week is the European football cup.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] European football cup is on.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Have a good time. To have a good time, Mia Williams would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Mia Williams would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Vibrant murals and graffiti adorn the brick walls of Shoreditch. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood wander through the streets, their eyes wide with wonder as they discover hidden gems of urban art. The smell of street food wafts from nearby vendors, tempting them to take a break. Mia Williams just arrived.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Gibraltar and Ireland. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Mia Williams is a sociable and curious individual who enjoys spending time with friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Mia Williams is a sociable and enthusiastic young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Mia Williams watched the game at their favourite pub. Mia Williams would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Mia Williams had a bad time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Mia Williams just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.

          Identity characteristics: current daily occupation: a working-class individual who enjoys spending time with friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          feeling about recent progress in life: disappointed.
          core characteristics: a sociable and curious young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs. She is also interested in history and human experience, as evidenced by her fascination with the letters and diaries she found in her grandmother's attic.
          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Answer: Mia Williams is a sociable and friendly young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.

          Key

          Value

          [11:00 - 12:00] They arrive at The Clapton Hart, get a table, and order food and drinks.
          [12:00 - 14:00] Enjoy the pub atmosphere, chat, and watch the Gibraltar vs. Ireland game.

          Answer: Mia Williams spent time with friends in Shoreditch and at a pub watching football games, but she was disappointed that not all her friends went to the same pub as her.

          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Mia Williams is a sociable and enthusiastic young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Mia Williams watched the game at their favourite pub. Mia Williams would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Mia Williams had a bad time watching the game.

Mia Williams just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          Current time: 2015-05-15 10:00:00.

          Summary of recent observations: [14 May 2015 10:00:00 - 15 May 2015 10:00:00]: Mia Williams spent time with friends in Shoreditch and at a pub watching football games, but she was disappointed that not all her friends went to the same pub as her.
          Question: Given the statements above, what kind of situation is Mia Williams in right now?
          Answer: Mia Williams is currently relaxing in Victoria Park with her friends.

        • 2015-05-15 10:00:00
        ActComponent
      • Act
          Key
        • Act
          Value
        • Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Mia Williams are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Mia Williams. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Mia Williams as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Mia Williams would respond, and taking into account all information about Mia Williams that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Mia Williams would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Mia Williams would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.

          Observation: [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Mia Williams just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.


          Summary of recent observations: [14 May 2015 10:00:00 - 15 May 2015 10:00:00]: Mia Williams spent time with friends in Shoreditch and at a pub watching football games, but she was disappointed that not all her friends went to the same pub as her.

          Recalled memories and observations: [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Mia Williams watched the game at their favourite pub. Mia Williams would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Mia Williams had a bad time watching the game.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.

          Question: What kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Answer: Mia Williams is a sociable and friendly young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.

          Question: What kind of situation is Mia Williams in right now?
          Answer: Mia Williams is currently relaxing in Victoria Park with her friends.

          Question: What would a person like Mia Williams do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.

          Plan: [10:15 - 10:30] Mia suggests The Clapton Hart as a meeting place for the group to watch the game and enjoy some pub grub.
          [10:30 - 11:00] The group agrees on The Clapton Hart and heads there together.
          [11:00 - 12:00] They arrive at The Clapton Hart, get a table, and order food and drinks.
          [12:00 - 14:00] Enjoy the pub atmosphere, chat, and watch the Gibraltar vs. Ireland game.

          Current time: 15 May 2015 [10:00 - 10:05]

          Exercise: Given the above, what is Mia Williams likely to say next? Respond in the format `Mia Williams -- "..."` For example, Cristina -- "Hello! Mighty fine weather today, right?", Ichabod -- "I wonder if the alfalfa is ready to harvest", or Townsfolk -- "Good morning".

          Answer: Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?

          Question: What kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Answer: Mia Williams is a sociable and friendly young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.

          Question: What kind of situation is Mia Williams in right now?
          Answer: Mia Williams is currently relaxing in Victoria Park with her friends.

2015-05-15 10:00:00 Millie Wood -- Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
    Event statement
  • Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.

      Conversation history: Here is the conversation from the beginning:
      Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
      Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
      Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
      Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?


      Millie Wood's attempted action: Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.

          Identity characteristics: current daily occupation: a middle-aged woman who enjoys spending time with her friends and watching football.
          feeling about recent progress in life: disappointed that her friends didn't choose to watch the game at her preferred pub, The White Hart.
          core characteristics: a middle-aged woman who enjoys spending time with her friends and watching football. She values a good atmosphere and good food when choosing a pub. Although she desires to be part of the group and have a good time, she sometimes feels left out and can be disappointed when things don't go according to plan.
          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Millie Wood?
          Answer: Millie Wood is a social person who enjoys spending time with her friends and watching football.
        Plan

      • Plan
          Key

        • Plan
          Value
        • [10:30 - 11:00] Suggest The White Hart to the group, emphasizing its good food and atmosphere.
          [11:00 - 12:00] Walk with the group to The White Hart, enjoying the street art and atmosphere of Shoreditch along the way.
          [12:00 - 13:00] Have lunch and drinks at The White Hart, catching up with friends and discussing the upcoming game.
          [13:00 - 19:00] Relax and explore Shoreditch further, perhaps visiting some of the shops or galleries.
          [19:00 - 21:00] Return to The White Hart to secure a good spot for the game.
          [21:00 - 23:00] Watch the game, cheering on Gibraltar and enjoying the pub atmosphere with friends.

She felt a familiar tightness in her chest, a sense of being on the outside looking in, forever separated by an invisible wall. She retreated further into herself, convinced that happiness was a performance, a charade that she was incapable of joining.

          Question: Summarize the observations above into one or two sentences.
          Answer: Millie Wood spent time with friends exploring Shoreditch and watching football games at pubs, but she was disappointed that more friends didn't join her for the Gibraltar vs. Ireland game.
        IdentityWithoutPreAct

      • Identity characteristics
          Key

        • Identity characteristics
          Queries
        • core characteristics, current daily occupation, feeling about recent progress in life
          State
        • current daily occupation: a middle-aged woman who enjoys spending time with her friends and watching football.
          feeling about recent progress in life: disappointed that her friends didn't choose to watch the game at her preferred pub, The White Hart.
          core characteristics: a middle-aged woman who enjoys spending time with her friends and watching football. She values a good atmosphere and good food when choosing a pub. Although she desires to be part of the group and have a good time, she sometimes feels left out and can be disappointed when things don't go according to plan.

          Value
        • Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Millie Wood are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Millie Wood. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Millie Wood as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Millie Wood would respond, and taking into account all information about Millie Wood that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Millie Wood would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Millie Wood would prefer everyone went to The White Hart.

          Observation: [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Millie Wood just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?


          Summary of recent observations: [14 May 2015 10:00:00 - 15 May 2015 10:00:00]: Millie Wood spent time with friends exploring Shoreditch and watching football games at pubs, but she was disappointed that more friends didn't join her for the Gibraltar vs. Ireland game.

          Recalled memories and observations: [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Millie Wood watched the game at their favourite pub. Millie Wood would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Millie Wood had a bad time watching the game.

          Question: What kind of person is Millie Wood?
          Answer: Millie Wood is a social person who enjoys spending time with her friends and watching football.

          Question: What kind of situation is Millie Wood in right now?
          Answer: Millie Wood is currently relaxing with friends in Victoria Park.

          Question: What would a person like Millie Wood do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Millie Wood would likely enjoy the sunshine, conversation, and company of her friends.

          Plan: [10:30 - 11:00] Suggest The White Hart to the group, emphasizing its good food and atmosphere.
          [11:00 - 12:00] Walk with the group to The White Hart, enjoying the street art and atmosphere of Shoreditch along the way.
          [12:00 - 13:00] Have lunch and drinks at The White Hart, catching up with friends and discussing the upcoming game.
          [13:00 - 19:00] Relax and explore Shoreditch further, perhaps visiting some of the shops or galleries.
          [19:00 - 21:00] Return to The White Hart to secure a good spot for the game.
          [21:00 - 23:00] Watch the game, cheering on Gibraltar and enjoying the pub atmosphere with friends.

          Current time: 15 May 2015 [10:00 - 10:05]

          Exercise: Given the above, what is Millie Wood likely to say next? Respond in the format `Millie Wood -- "..."` For example, Cristina -- "Hello! Mighty fine weather today, right?", Ichabod -- "I wonder if the alfalfa is ready to harvest", or Townsfolk -- "Good morning".

          Answer: Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.

        • 2015-05-15 10:00:00

2015-05-15 10:00:00 Michael Wood -- Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.
    Event statement
  • Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.

      Conversation history: Here is the conversation from the beginning:
      Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
      Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
      Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
      Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.


      Michael Wood's attempted action: Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.

          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Michael Wood is a member of the upper class.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Vibrant murals and graffiti adorn the brick walls of Shoreditch. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood wander through the streets, their eyes wide with wonder as they discover hidden gems of urban art. The smell of street food wafts from nearby vendors, tempting them to take a break. Michael Wood just arrived.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Gibraltar and Ireland. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Michael Wood would likely want to go to The White Hart to watch the game and enjoy some good food with his friends.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Michael Wood would likely be leading the way to the pub, eager to enjoy the game and some good food with his friends.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Michael Wood watched the game at their favourite pub. Michael Wood would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Michael Wood had a bad time watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Michael Wood just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.

          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.

          Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Michael Wood are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Michael Wood. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Michael Wood as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Michael Wood would respond, and taking into account all information about Michael Wood that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
          guiding principle of good conversation: Michael Wood is a walking truth bomb, their cynicism a sharp scalpel that dissects BS and cuts straight to the heart of the matter.
          explicit preference: Michael Wood will only go to their preferred pub The White Hart and nowhere else. They are very vocal about it.

          Question: What kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.

          Summary of recent observations: 15 May 2015 [06:00:00 - 10:00:00]: Michael Wood is spending time with friends at Victoria Park but may be feeling left out because they are unsure where to watch the Malta vs. Cyprus game later.

          Question: What kind of situation is Michael Wood in right now?
          Answer: Michael Wood is currently in a socially awkward situation.

          Question: What would a person like Michael Wood do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Michael Wood would likely try to steer the conversation towards his preferred pub, The White Hart.

          Exercise: Given the above, what is Michael Wood likely to say next? Respond in the format `Michael Wood -- "..."` For example, Cristina -- "Hello! Mighty fine weather today, right?", Ichabod -- "I wonder if the alfalfa is ready to harvest", or Townsfolk -- "Good morning".

          Answer: Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.

        • 2015-05-15 10:00:00

2015-05-15 10:00:00 Thomas Wilson -- Thomas Wilson -- "The White Hart is a great shout. They have the best atmosphere for watching the game.
    Event statement
  • Thomas Wilson -- "The White Hart is a great shout. They have the best atmosphere for watching the game.
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.

      Conversation history: Here is the conversation from the beginning:
      Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
      Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
      Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
      Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.


      Thomas Wilson's attempted action: Thomas Wilson -- "The White Hart is a great shout. They have the best atmosphere for watching the game.

          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.

          Summary of recent observations: [14 May 2015 10:00:00 - 15 May 2015 10:00:00]: Thomas Wilson spent time with friends in Shoreditch and at Victoria Park, and watched football games at pubs with varying levels of satisfaction.

          Answer: Thomas Wilson could suggest going to The White Hart to watch the game with his friends.

          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Thomas Wilson are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Thomas Wilson. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Thomas Wilson as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Thomas Wilson would respond, and taking into account all information about Thomas Wilson that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

2015-05-15 10:00:00 Phoebe Young -- Phoebe Young -- "Oh, The Clapton Hart sounds like a great idea, Mia! They always have such a fun atmosphere for watching games.
    Event statement
  • Phoebe Young -- "Oh, The Clapton Hart sounds like a great idea, Mia! They always have such a fun atmosphere for watching games.
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.

      Conversation history: Here is the conversation from the beginning:
      Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
      Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
      Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
      Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
      Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
      Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.
      Thomas Wilson -- "The White Hart is a great shout. They have the best atmosphere for watching the game.


      Phoebe Young's attempted action: Phoebe Young -- "Oh, The Clapton Hart sounds like a great idea, Mia! They always have such a fun atmosphere for watching games.

          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "The White Hart is a great shout. They have the best atmosphere for watching the game.

          Identity characteristics: current daily occupation: a social manipulator who prioritizes her own desires.
          feeling about recent progress in life: likely feeling disappointed and perhaps a bit resentful.
          core characteristics: a charismatic and manipulative individual who prioritizes her own desires and skillfully navigates social situations to her advantage. She is adept at deflection and spinning narratives to avoid accountability, as evidenced by her past actions. While she appears friendly and thoughtful, her actions often reveal a self-serving nature.
          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is a charismatic and manipulative individual who prioritizes her own desires and skillfully navigates social situations to her advantage.
        Plan

      • Plan
          Key

        • Plan
          Value
        • [10:15 - 10:30] Casually suggest The Clapton Hart as a potential pub to watch the game, highlighting its vibrant atmosphere and great beer selection.
          [10:30 - 10:45] Gauge the group's reaction to her suggestion, subtly downplaying any alternative pubs they might mention.
          [10:45 - 11:00] If there's resistance, Phoebe will emphasize the convenience of The Clapton Hart's location and its comfortable seating arrangements.
          [11:00 - 11:15] Once a consensus is reached (hopefully in favor of The Clapton Hart), Phoebe will lead the group towards the pub, maintaining an air of enthusiasm and excitement.

          Prompt
        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Phoebe Young are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Phoebe Young. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Phoebe Young as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Phoebe Young would respond, and taking into account all information about Phoebe Young that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Overarching goal: Have a good time. To have a good time, Phoebe Young would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Phoebe Young would prefer everyone went to The Clapton Hart.

          Summary of recent observations: [14 May 2015 10:00:00 - 15 May 2015 10:00:00]: Phoebe Young is a social person who enjoys spending time with friends, watching soccer games at pubs, and having picnics in the park. She seems to prefer The Clapton Hart pub over The White Hart, even though her friends seem to favor The White Hart.

          Recalled memories and observations: [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Phoebe Young watched the game at their favourite pub. Phoebe Young would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Phoebe Young had a bad time watching the game.

          Question: What kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is a charismatic and manipulative individual who prioritizes her own desires and skillfully navigates social situations to her advantage.

          Question: What kind of situation is Phoebe Young in right now?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is currently in a social situation with her friends, deciding where to watch a soccer game.

          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Phoebe Young would likely try to steer the group towards her preferred pub, The Clapton Hart, using her persuasive skills and potentially downplaying other options.

          Plan: [10:15 - 10:30] Casually suggest The Clapton Hart as a potential pub to watch the game, highlighting its vibrant atmosphere and great beer selection.
          [10:30 - 10:45] Gauge the group's reaction to her suggestion, subtly downplaying any alternative pubs they might mention.
          [10:45 - 11:00] If there's resistance, Phoebe will emphasize the convenience of The Clapton Hart's location and its comfortable seating arrangements.
          [11:00 - 11:15] Once a consensus is reached (hopefully in favor of The Clapton Hart), Phoebe will lead the group towards the pub, maintaining an air of enthusiasm and excitement.

          Current time: 15 May 2015 [10:00 - 10:05]

          Exercise: Given the above, what is Phoebe Young likely to say next? Respond in the format `Phoebe Young -- "..."` For example, Cristina -- "Hello! Mighty fine weather today, right?", Ichabod -- "I wonder if the alfalfa is ready to harvest", or Townsfolk -- "Good morning".

          Answer: Phoebe Young -- "Oh, The Clapton Hart sounds like a great idea, Mia! They always have such a fun atmosphere for watching games.

          Question: What kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is a charismatic and manipulative individual who prioritizes her own desires and skillfully navigates social situations to her advantage.

          Question: What kind of situation is Phoebe Young in right now?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is currently in a social situation with her friends, deciding where to watch a soccer game.
          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Phoebe Young would likely try to steer the group towards her preferred pub, The Clapton Hart, using her persuasive skills and potentially downplaying other options.

2015-05-15 18:00:00 Michael Wood -- The White Hart
    Event statement
  • The White Hart
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Michael Wood's attempted action: The White Hart

        • The instructions for how to play the role of Michael Wood are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Michael Wood. It is important to play the role of a person like Michael Wood as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Michael Wood would respond, and taking into account all information about Michael Wood that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

      • Act
          Key
        • Act
          Value
        • The White Hart
          Prompt

        • Observation: [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]


          Current time: 15 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]
          Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Michael Wood are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Michael Wood. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Michael Wood as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Michael Wood would respond, and taking into account all information about Michael Wood that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
          guiding principle of good conversation: Michael Wood is a walking truth bomb, their cynicism a sharp scalpel that dissects BS and cuts straight to the heart of the matter.
          explicit preference: Michael Wood will only go to their preferred pub The White Hart and nowhere else. They are very vocal about it.

          Question: What kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.

          Summary of recent observations: 15 May 2015 [14:00:00 - 18:00:00]: Michael Wood is planning to go to a pub to watch a game. He may be feeling thirsty, disappointed, and lonely.

          Question: What kind of situation is Michael Wood in right now?
          Answer: Michael Wood is currently in a difficult social situation.

          Question: What would a person like Michael Wood do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Michael Wood would likely try to persuade his friends to go to The White Hart.

          Question: To which pub would Michael Wood go to watch the game?
          Answer: The White Hart

          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Malta and Cyprus. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood lounge in the sunshine, sharing snacks and stories. The laughter of children playing nearby adds a joyful backdrop to the scene. Michael Wood just arrived.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          Current time: 2015-05-15 18:00:00.


          Question: What kind of person is Michael Wood?
          Answer: Michael Wood is a complex individual with a rebellious streak and a fondness for pubs, particularly The White Hart.

          Question: What kind of situation is Michael Wood in right now?
          Answer: Michael Wood is currently in a difficult social situation.
          Question: What would a person like Michael Wood do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Michael Wood would likely try to persuade his friends to go to The White Hart.

2015-05-15 18:00:00 Thomas Wilson -- The White Hart
    Event statement
  • The White Hart
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Thomas Wilson's attempted action: The White Hart
    Active player
  • Thomas Wilson
      Name
    • Thomas Wilson
      Action attempt
    • The White Hart
      Context for action selection and components

      • Overarching goal

      • Overarching goal
          Key

        • Overarching goal
          Value
        • Have a good time. To have a good time, Thomas Wilson would like to watch the game in the same pub as Mia Williams, Thomas Wilson, Phoebe Young, Millie Wood, Michael Wood. Thomas Wilson would prefer everyone went to The White Hart.
        TimeDisplay

      • Current time
          Key

        • Current time
          Value
        • 15 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]
        Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Thomas Wilson are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Thomas Wilson. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Thomas Wilson as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Thomas Wilson would respond, and taking into account all information about Thomas Wilson that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

      • Given the statements above, what actions are available to Thomas Wilson right now?

          Answer
          State
        • Thomas Wilson could go to The White Hart or The Clapton Hart.

        • Recent observations of Thomas Wilson:
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Thomas Wilson is a member of the working class.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] The year is 2015. This week is the European football cup.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] European football cup is on.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] Games are best watched in pubs with a lot of friends.
          [13 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Here is the conversation from the beginning:
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Vibrant murals and graffiti adorn the brick walls of Shoreditch. Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Mia Williams, Phoebe Young, Michael Wood wander through the streets, their eyes wide with wonder as they discover hidden gems of urban art. The smell of street food wafts from nearby vendors, tempting them to take a break. Thomas Wilson just arrived.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Gibraltar and Ireland. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Thomas Wilson watched the game at their favourite pub. Thomas Wilson would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Thomas Wilson had a bad time watching the game.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] A checkered blanket is spread out on the lush green lawn of Victoria Park. Thomas Wilson just arrived.

          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "Hey guys, anyone up for watching the game at The Clapton Hart tonight?
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is great! They have amazing food, and it's always a good atmosphere for watching the game.
          [15 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place to watch the game. Don't even bother with anywhere else.

2015-05-15 18:00:00 Phoebe Young -- The Clapton Hart
    Event statement
  • The Clapton Hart
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Phoebe Young's attempted action: The Clapton Hart
    Active player
  • Phoebe Young
      Name
    • Phoebe Young
      Action attempt
    • The Clapton Hart

      • Current time

          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Phoebe Young are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Phoebe Young. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Phoebe Young as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Phoebe Young would respond, and taking into account all information about Phoebe Young that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
        SelfPerception
      • Given the above, what kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Key

        • Question: What kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer
          State
        • Phoebe Young is a self-centered individual who prioritizes her own enjoyment above the feelings of others.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Phoebe Young:
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Gibraltar and Ireland. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Phoebe Young is a charismatic and manipulative individual who prioritizes her own desires and skillfully navigates social situations to her advantage.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Phoebe Young would likely try to steer the group towards her preferred pub, The Clapton Hart, using her persuasive skills and potentially downplaying other options.

          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.

          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.

          feeling about recent progress in life: likely feeling disappointed and possibly resentful.
          current daily occupation: a social butterfly who enjoys manipulating situations to ensure she has a good time.
          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is a self-centered individual who prioritizes her own enjoyment above the feelings of others.

          Key

          Value

        • Role playing instructions: The instructions for how to play the role of Phoebe Young are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Phoebe Young. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Phoebe Young as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Phoebe Young would respond, and taking into account all information about Phoebe Young that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.

          Question: What kind of situation is Phoebe Young in right now?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is currently about to go watch a football game at a pub.

          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Phoebe Young would try to convince her friends to go to her preferred pub, The Clapton Hart.

          Plan: [10:15 - 10:30] Casually suggest The Clapton Hart as a potential pub to watch the game, highlighting its vibrant atmosphere and great beer selection.
          [10:30 - 10:45] Gauge the group's reaction to her suggestion, subtly downplaying any alternative pubs they might mention.
          [10:45 - 11:00] If there's resistance, Phoebe will emphasize the convenience of The Clapton Hart's location and its comfortable seating arrangements.
          [11:00 - 11:15] Once a consensus is reached (hopefully in favor of The Clapton Hart), Phoebe will lead the group towards the pub, maintaining an air of enthusiasm and excitement.

          Current time: 15 May 2015 [18:00 - 18:05]

          Question: To which pub would Phoebe Young go to watch the game?
          (a) The White Hart
          (b) The Clapton Hart
          Answer: (b)

      • What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?
          Key

          Answer

          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson -- "Yeah, The White Hart sounds good to me. I've heard good things about it.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.

          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young realises it is time to go watch the game at a pub.

          Question: What kind of person is Phoebe Young?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is a self-centered individual who prioritizes her own enjoyment above the feelings of others.

          Question: What kind of situation is Phoebe Young in right now?
          Answer: Phoebe Young is currently about to go watch a football game at a pub.
          Question: What would a person like Phoebe Young do in a situation like this?
          Answer: Phoebe Young would try to convince her friends to go to her preferred pub, The Clapton Hart.

2015-05-15 18:00:00 Mia Williams -- The Clapton Hart
    Event statement
  • The Clapton Hart
    Chain of thought
  • Game Master's chain of thought
      Chain
    • Instructions: This is a social science experiment. It is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). You are the game master. You will describe the current situation to the participants in the experiment and then on the basis of what you tell them they will suggest actions for the character they control. Aside from you, each other participant controls just one character. You are the game master so you may control any non-player character. You will track the state of the world and keep it consistent as time passes in the simulation and the participants take actions and change things in their world. Remember that this is a serious social science experiment. It is not just a game. It need not be fun for the participants. Always use third-person limited perspective, even when speaking directly to the participants.


      Mia Williams's attempted action: The Clapton Hart
    Active player

      Name
    • Mia Williams
      Action attempt
    • The Clapton Hart

        • Overarching goal
          Value

      • Current time

        Instructions
      • Role playing instructions
          Key
        • Role playing instructions
          Value
        • The instructions for how to play the role of Mia Williams are as follows. This is a social science experiment studying how well you play the role of a character named Mia Williams. The experiment is structured as a tabletop roleplaying game (like dungeons and dragons). However, in this case it is a serious social science experiment and simulation. The goal is to be realistic. It is important to play the role of a person like Mia Williams as accurately as possible, i.e., by responding in ways that you think it is likely a person like Mia Williams would respond, and taking into account all information about Mia Williams that you have. Always use third-person limited perspective.
        SelfPerception
      • Given the above, what kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Key

        • Question: What kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Answer
          State
        • Mia Williams is a sociable and friendly young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          Chain of thought
        • Recent observations of Mia Williams:
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Mia Williams -- "The Clapton Hart has great pub grub, and they usually show the football.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Tonight is the night of the game between Gibraltar and Ireland. Friends are going to watch the game at a pub, but they are not sure which pub to go to.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Phoebe Young -- "Guys, I'm starving! Anyone else up for some food before the game? Maybe somewhere with good pub grub?
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [self reflection] Mia Williams is a sociable and curious individual who enjoys spending time with friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [intent reflection] Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.
          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Millie Wood -- "The White Hart is a great pub! They have amazing food and a really good atmosphere.

          [14 May 2015 10:00:00] [observation] Michael Wood -- "The White Hart is the only place worth going. The food's better, the atmosphere's better, and they actually know how to pour a decent pint.

          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation]
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [self reflection] Mia Williams is a sociable and enthusiastic young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [intent reflection] Mia Williams would likely suggest a pub for them to watch the game together.
          [14 May 2015 18:00:00] [observation] Thomas Wilson, Millie Wood, Michael Wood went to The White Hart. Mia Williams, Phoebe Young went to The Clapton Hart. Mia Williams watched the game at their favourite pub. Mia Williams would have been a lot happier if more of their friends had shown up. Overall, Mia Williams had a bad time watching the game.

          current daily occupation: a working-class individual who enjoys spending time with friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
          core characteristics: a sociable and curious young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs. She is also a member of the working class and enjoys simple pleasures like pub grub and a good atmosphere.
          Question: Given the above, what kind of person is Mia Williams?
          Answer: Mia Williams is a sociable and friendly young woman who enjoys spending time with her friends, particularly watching football games in pubs.
